alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Linn and northeastern Lane Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 359 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue River, or 22 miles southeast of Sweet Home, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue River and Nimrod. In Oregon this includes State Highway 126 from Eugene to McKenzie Bridge near mile marker 34, and between mile markers 36 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
